sentences.sContent: They didn’t tell the police for fear of reprisal .
sentences.sCn: 由于害怕报复，他们没有报警。

remMethod.val: re + pris ( = price， 代价) + al → 让对方付出代价 → 报复

words.tran: 重复；（从地产每年收入中扣除的）年金

trans.tranOther: something violent or harmful which you do to punish someone for something bad they have done to you
